--create topic testtopic;
use test;
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 tinyint,
    col2 int,
    col3 double,
    col4 decimal(10, 2),
    col5 varchar,
    col6 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1,
        v2,
        v3,
        v4,
        v5,
        v6
    ),
    properties = (
        "prop1" = "val1",
        "prop2" = "val2"
    )
);

create materialized view test_mv_1 as select * from test_source_1;

--load data dataset_1;

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
select * from test_mv_1 order by col0;

--we close the session, this causes the session to be recreated on a random Prana node;
--we verify the source and MV is still accessible;

--close session;
use test;
select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
select * from test_mv_1 order by col0;

--we repeat this a few times;

--close session;
use test;
select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
select * from test_mv_1 order by col0;

--close session;
use test;
select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
select * from test_mv_1 order by col0;

--close session;
use test;
select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
select * from test_mv_1 order by col0;

--close session;
use test;
select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
select * from test_mv_1 order by col0;

drop materialized view test_mv_1;
drop source test_source_1;

--delete topic testtopic;
